name: Under Pressure
description: Pneumaticcraft is the backbone of almost every bit of technology you will build. Time to learn how to use it.

quests.name: Exploding Iron
quests.description: Not that your immediate needs are taken care of, it is time to start building the technology you will need to survive here for the long term. To that end, you will need a new form of metal.

tasks.longDescription: This is simple, just go smelt some ore into iron ingots.
Next up, you will need some TNT. You should have plenty of gunpowder by now, and you can hammer cobblestone into gravel and then hammer that to get the sand you need.

I suggest going a little away from your base for this one. Dig a hole, drop the iron in it, place the TNT next to the iron, ignite the TNT and then stand back. When the smoke clears you shold see you now have some compressed iron. Unfortunately, some of the iron is lost. Don't worry, there will be a better way to do this later.
